title.value: Производственные испытания роторной косилки, оснащенной ножами с расходящимися режущими кромками
Production test of a rotor mower equipped with knives with divergent cutting edges

journal.title: Bulletin of the Belarussian State Agricultural Academy : the guidance journal

person.name: Sharshunov, V.A., Mogilev State Univ. of Foodstuffs (Belarus)
Rubets, S.G., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented methods and results of production test of rotor mowers K-78M and AS-1, equipped with knives with divergent cutting edges, which showed that improved knives ensure qualitative indicators of the process of cutting, corresponding to agro-technical requirements. There was determined annual economic effect of the application of the rotor mower with knives which have divergent cutting edges on melioration systems with plots covered by trees and shrubs. The obtained data show that the advanced knifes with dispersing cutting edges provided quality indicators of mowing process, which correspond to agrotechnical requirements. At the same time the diameter of cut-off trunks of wood and shrubby vegetation increased by 2,2 times for the K-78M mower and by 2,3 times for AS-1, cut height decreased, total productivity increased by 8%. However, in connection with the severe conditions of work the specific fuel consumption increased by 0,3% for the K-78M mower and by 0,44% for AS-1.
